// licensed with CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/
// by Zach Krall
// http://zachkrall.online/

osc( 215, 0.1, 2 )
.modulate(
  osc( 2, -0.3, 100 )
  .rotate(15)
)
.mult(
  osc( 215, -0.1, 2)
  .pixelate( 50, 50 )
)
.color( 0.9, 0.0, 0.9 )
.modulate(
  osc( 6, -0.1 )
  .rotate( 9 )
)
.add(
  osc( 10, -0.9, 900 )
  .color(1,0,1)
)
.mult(
  shape(900, 0.2, 1)
  .luma()
  .repeatX(2)
  .repeatY(2)
  .colorama(10)
)
.modulate(
  osc( 9, -0.3, 900 )
  .rotate( 6 )
)
.add(
  osc(4, 1, 90)
  .color(0.2,0,1)
)
.out()

// ee_1 . EYE IN THE SKY
// example of mask and function modulation
// e_e // @eerie_ear
noise(18)
	.colorama(10)
	.posterize(2)
	.kaleid(50)
	.mask(shape(25, 0.435)
		.modulateScale(noise(600.5, 0.5)))
	.mask(shape(600, 1, 1.639))
	.modulateScale(osc(10, 0.125, 0.05)
		.kaleid(50))
	.mult(osc(20, 0.05, 2.4)
		.kaleid(50), 0.25)
	.scale(1.75, 0.65, 0.50)
	.modulate(noise(0.257))
	.saturate(6)
	.posterize(4, 0.2)
	.scale(1.50)
	.out();

).sub(shape(4, 12), 0.2).rotate(1, 0.05)

// licensed with CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/
// ee_2 . MULTIVERSE . time and feedback
// e_e // @eerie_ear
pat = () => solid()
	.layer(solid()
		.diff(osc(time / 16 * 1, time / 1000 * 0.2)
			.mult(osc(time / 8 * 1, time / 1006 * 0.2)
				.rotate(1.57))
			.modulate(shape(106, 1, 0.05))
			.mult(shape(106, 1, 0.05))))
	.modulateScale(osc(2, 0.125), 0.125);
// 
solid()
	.layer(solid(1, 1, 1)
		.mult(pat()
			.diff(src(o0)
				.scale(0.2)
				.mult(solid(), [0.7, 0.6, 0.4, 0.6])
				.kaleid(1.01)
				.saturate(0.3)))
		.layer(solid(1, 1, 1)
			.mask(noise(2, 0.05)
				.invert()
				.colorama(0.5)
				.posterize(8, 4)
				.luma(0.25)
				.thresh(0.5)
				.modulateRotate(osc(1, 0.5)))
			.mult(gradient(0.5)
				.kaleid(1)
				.colorama(2)
				.saturate(1.1)
				.contrast(1.6)
				.mult(solid(), 0.45))))
	.out();

speed = 0.5;

// licensed with CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/
// @woshibide

let ch1 = ()=>a.fft[0]
let ch2 = ()=>a.fft[1]
let ch3 = ()=>a.fft[2]
let ch4 = ()=>a.fft[3]

a.show()
a.setSmooth(0.9)
a.setCutoff(0.3)
a.setScale(10)

osc(4, 0.3, 1)
  .modulate(osc(4,0,0))
  .modulateScale(voronoi(ch4))
  .modulateKaleid(noise(Math.cos(Math.cos(time/2))),20,3)
  .modulateRepeat(osc(Math.tan(time)), 30)
  .modulateKaleid(noise(Math.cos(Math.sin(time/2))),20,3)
  .out()

osc(10, 0.1, 0.5)
  .color(1, 0, 0)
  .modulate(
    osc(30)
      .thresh()
      .rotate(1, 0.1)
  )
  .kaleid(4)
  .scale(() => Math.sin(time) * 0.5 + 1)
  .rotate(() => Math.sin(time) * 0.1)
  .add(
    shape(3, 0.8, 0.2)
      .color(1, 1, 1)
      .repeat(5, 5)
      .kaleid(4)
      .modulate(noise(3, 0.1), 0.5)
      .blend(o0, 0.5)
  )
  .add(
    shape(4, 0.8, 0.2)
      .color(1, 1, 1)
      .repeat(5, 5)
      .kaleid(4)
      .modulate(noise(3, 0.1), 0.5)
      .blend(o0, 0.5)
      .rotate(1.57) // Rotar para dar forma de hocico
  )
  .out()

// e_e // @eerie_ear
noise(18)
  .colorama(1)
  .posterize(2)
  .kaleid(50)
  .mask(
    shape(25, 0.25).modulateScale(
      noise(400.5, 0.5)
    )
  )
  .mask(shape(400, 1, 2.125))
  .modulateScale(osc(6, 0.125, 0.05).kaleid(50))
  .mult(osc(20, 0.05, 2.4).kaleid(50), 0.25)
  .scale(1.75, 0.65, 0.5)
  .modulate(noise(0.5))
  .saturate(6)
  .posterize(4, 0.2)
  .scale(1.5)
  .out();

noise(6,.05)
.mult( osc(9,0, ()=>Math.sin(time/1.5)+2 ) )
.mult(
    noise(26,.03).brightness(1.2).contrast(2)
    .mult( osc(9,0, ()=>Math.sin(time/3)+13 ) )
)
.diff(
    noise(15,.04).brightness(.2).contrast(1.3)
    .mult( osc(9,0, ()=>Math.sin(time/5)+13 ) )
    .rotate( ()=>time/33 )
)
.scale( ()=>Math.sin(time/6.2)*.12+.15 )
.modulateScale(
    osc(3,0,0).mult( osc(3,0,0).rotate(3.14/2) )
    .rotate( ()=>time/25 ).scale(.39).scale(1,.6,1).invert()
    , ()=>Math.sin(time/5.3)*1.5+3  )
.rotate( ()=>time/22 )
.mult( shape(100,.9,.01).scale(1,.6,1) )
.out()

osc(100, Math.cos(time * 0.5) * 0.5, Math.sin(time * 2) * 1.5)
  .luma()
  .kaleid([3, 2, 3, 8])
  .rotate(Math.sin(time * 0.25), Math.cos(time * 0.5) * -2.5)
  .rotate(-25, Math.sin(time * 2) * 0.5)
  .modulate(noise(Math.sin(time * 20.5) * Math.tan(time * 10.25) * Math.cos(time), 1.25))
  .kaleid([4, 4, 8, 16, 3, 3, 2, 5, 20])
  .modulate(noise((Math.cos(time * 0.25) * 0.5) + Math.tan(1/time * 10.5)))
.out(o0)

.add(noise(10, 0.1))

// Countdown-ish - @wispeh_
osc(3, 2, 1)
	.modulate(voronoi(3, 2, 1), 3)
	.kaleid(5)
	.layer(noise(4)
		.modulate(osc(32), 1)
		.luma(.1))
	.diff(shape(2, .4)
		.color(.07, .05, 2)
		.hue(() => Math.sin(.1 * time)))
	.blend(o0, .1)
	.blend(o0, .1)
	.modulateScale(o0, -.9)
	.blend(o0, .1)
	.modulateScale(o0, .3)
	.saturate(.07)
	.blend(src(o0)
		.saturate(2)
		.luma(.25))
	.contrast(1.00099)
	.rotate(0.097)
	.out(o0)
src(o0)
	.modulateHue(noise(32, .1)
		.colorama(5.1)
		.pixelate(100, 50), 150)
	.blend(o0, .7)
	.modulateScale(o0, .1)
	.out(o1)
render(o1)

.out(o0)

// clouds of passage
// by Nesso
// www.nesso.xyz
shape([4, 5, 6].fast(0.1)
		.smooth(1), 0.000001, [0.2, 0.7].smooth(1))
	.color(0.2, 0.4, 0.3)
	.scrollX(() => Math.sin(time * 0.27))
	.add(shape([4, 5, 6].fast(0.1)
			.smooth(0.875), 0.000001, [0.2, 0.7, 0.5, 0.3].smooth(1))
		.color(0.6, 0.144, 0.5)
		.scrollY(0.35)
		.scrollX(() => Math.sin(time * 0.236)))
	.add(shape([4, 5, 6].fast(0.1)
			.smooth(1), 0.000001, [0.2, 0.7, 0.3].smooth(1))
		.color(0.2, 0.4, 0.6)
		.scrollY(-0.35)
		.scrollX(() => Math.sin(time * 0.41) * -1))
	.add(src(o0)
		.shift(0.001, 0.01, 0.002)
		.scrollX([0.05, -0.05].fast(0.1)
			.smooth(1))
		.scale([1.05, 0.9].fast(0.3)
			.smooth(1), [1.05, 0.9, 1].fast(0.096)
			.smooth(1)), 0.85)
	.modulate(voronoi(1000, 2, 2))
	.out();

// ee_2 . MULTIVERSE . time and feedback
// e_e // @eerie_ear
pat = ()=>
solid()
.layer(solid().diff(
  osc((time/16) * 3, (time/1000) * 0.2  )
    .mult(osc((time/8) * 1, (time/1006) * 0.2  ).rotate(1.57))
    .modulate((shape(106,1,0.05)))
    .mult(shape(106,1,0.05))
  ))
  .modulateScale(osc(2,0.125),0.125)
//
solid()
.layer(solid(1,1,1)
  .mult(pat()
  .diff(src(o0).scale(0.2).mult(solid(),[0.7,0.6,46.4,0.6]).kaleid(1.01).saturate(0.3))
)
.layer(solid(1,1,1)
    .mask(
      noise(2,0.05)
      .invert().colorama(2).posterize(8,14).luma(0.25).thresh(0.5)
      .modulateRotate(osc(1,0.5))
    )
    .mult(gradient(0.5).kaleid(1).colorama(2).saturate(1.1).contrast(1.6).mult(solid(),0.45))
  ))
  .out()

// Complex Triangle Animation

osc(3, 0.5, 1)
  .rotate(({time}) => time % 360)
  .kaleid(3)
  .color(
    () => Math.sin(time * 0.5) + 1,
    () => Math.cos(time * 0.8) + 1,
    () => Math.sin(time * 9.3) + 1
  )
  .pixelate(20, 20)
  .modulateRotate(osc(5, 0.1, 0.5))
  .scale(() => Math.sin(time * 0.2) * 0.5 + 1)
  .repeat(2, 2)
  .out()
